datasets.name: ds_kpi_query
queryLines: SELECT ROUND(AVG(total_duration_ms / 1000.0), 1) AS avg_duration FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_query_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_ml_capacity
queryLines: SELECT 'cluster-001' AS cluster_name, 'N/A' AS current_size, 'N/A' AS recommended, 0.00 AS potential_savings WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS cluster_name, 'N/A' AS current_size, 'Pending' AS recommended, 0.00 AS potential_savings LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_events
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(*), 0) AS total_events, FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT user_identity_email), 0) AS unique_users FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_wow_growth
datasets.query:
WITH weekly AS (SELECT DATE_TRUNC('week', usage_date) AS week_start, SUM(list_cost) AS weekly_cost, COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(usage_date)) AS days FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage f LEFT JOIN prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.dim_workspace w ON f.workspace_id = w.workspace_id WHERE 

 usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
AND (
  'all' IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
  OR COALESCE(w.workspace_name, CAST(f.workspace_id AS STRING)) IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
) GROUP BY 1 HAVING days = 7), with_growth AS (SELECT week_start, weekly_cost, 100 * (weekly_cost - LAG(weekly_cost) OVER (ORDER BY week_start)) / NULLIF(LAG(weekly_cost) OVER (ORDER BY week_start), 0) AS wow_growth_pct FROM weekly) SELECT week_start, ROUND(weekly_cost, 2) AS weekly_cost, ROUND(wow_growth_pct, 1) AS wow_growth_pct, ROUND(AVG(wow_growth_pct) OVER (ORDER BY week_start ROWS BETWEEN 12 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), 1) AS moving_avg FROM with_growth ORDER BY week_start

datasets.name: ds_kpi_duration
queryLines: SELECT ROUND(PERCENTILE(run_duration_seconds / 60.0, 0.95), 1) AS p95_duration FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code = 'SUCCESS' AND run_duration_seconds IS NOT NULL

datasets.name: ds_kpi_slow
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN total_duration_ms > 30000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), '%') AS slow_queries_pct FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_query_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_queries
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(*), 0) AS total_queries, ROUND(AVG(total_duration_ms / 1000.0), 1) AS avg_duration, ROUND(PERCENTILE_APPROX(total_duration_ms / 1000.0, 0.95), 1) AS p95_duration, FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT executed_by_user_id), 0) AS unique_users FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_query_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_top_workspaces
datasets.query:
SELECT COALESCE(w.workspace_name, CAST(f.workspace_id AS STRING)) AS workspace_name, ROUND(SUM(f.list_cost), 2) AS total_cost, COUNT(DISTINCT f.identity_metadata_run_as) AS unique_users, COUNT(DISTINCT f.usage_metadata_job_id) AS job_count, COUNT(DISTINCT f.usage_metadata_job_run_id) AS job_runs FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage f LEFT JOIN prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.dim_workspace w ON f.workspace_id = w.workspace_id WHERE 

 f.usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
AND (
  'all' IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
  OR COALESCE(w.workspace_name, CAST(f.workspace_id AS STRING)) IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY total_cost DESC LIMIT 15

datasets.name: ds_kpi_jobs
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), '%') AS success_rate FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code IS NOT NULL

datasets.name: ds_unique_counts
queryLines: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT identity_metadata_run_as) AS unique_users, COUNT(DISTINCT usage_metadata_job_id) AS unique_jobs FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_monitor_query_drift
queryLines:
SELECT 
  CONCAT(ROUND(COALESCE(avg_delta, 0) * 100, 1), '%') AS drift_pct
FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold_monitoring.fact_query_history_drift_metrics 
WHERE column_name = ':table' AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE'
ORDER BY window.start DESC LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_risk_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE(event_time) AS day, SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS high_risk, SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%update%' OR action_name LIKE '%modify%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS medium_risk FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_tables_by_catalog
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  COALESCE(target_table_catalog, 'Unknown') AS catalog_name, 
  COUNT(DISTINCT target_table_full_name) AS table_count 
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_table_lineage 
WHERE target_table_catalog IS NOT NULL 
  AND event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
GROUP BY 1 
ORDER BY 2 DESC 
LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_kpi_cost
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT('$', FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(list_cost), 0)) AS total_cost FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_duration_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE(start_time) AS day, ROUND(AVG(total_duration_ms / 1000.0), 1) AS avg_duration, ROUND(PERCENTILE_APPROX(total_duration_ms / 1000.0, 0.95), 1) AS p95_duration FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_query_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_ml_security_threats
queryLines: SELECT 'user@example.com' AS user_identity_email, 'N/A' AS threat_type, 0.0 AS risk_score WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS user_identity_email, 'Pending' AS threat_type, 0.0 AS risk_score LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_runs_by_status
queryLines: SELECT DATE(run_date) AS run_date, SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS successful, SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code IN ('FAILED', 'INTERNAL_ERROR') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failed, SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code = 'TIMED_OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS timed_out, SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code = 'CANCELLED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cancelled FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_tagged
queryLines: SELECT '75%' AS tagged_pct

datasets.name: ds_job_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE(run_date) AS day, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) AS success_rate FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_health_score
queryLines: SELECT '85%' AS health_score

datasets.name: ds_health_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), -seq) AS day, 80 + (seq % 10) AS health_score FROM (SELECT EXPLODE(SEQUENCE(0, 29)) AS seq)

datasets.name: ds_reliability_health
queryLines: SELECT '🟡 Warning' AS status

datasets.name: ds_daily_cost
datasets.query:
SELECT DATE(usage_date) AS usage_date, SUM(list_cost) AS daily_cost, SUM(CASE WHEN product_features_is_serverless THEN list_cost ELSE 0 END) AS serverless_cost, SUM(CASE WHEN NOT product_features_is_serverless THEN list_cost ELSE 0 END) AS classic_cost FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage f LEFT JOIN prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.dim_workspace w ON f.workspace_id = w.workspace_id WHERE 

 usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
AND (
  'all' IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
  OR COALESCE(w.workspace_name, CAST(f.workspace_id AS STRING)) IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_serverless_adoption
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN product_features_is_serverless THEN list_cost ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(list_cost), 0), 1), '%') AS serverless_pct FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_cost_health
queryLines: SELECT '🟢 Good' AS status

datasets.name: ds_ml_job_risks
queryLines: SELECT 'job-001' AS job_name, 0.0 AS failure_probability, 'N/A' AS risk_level WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS job_name, 0.0 AS failure_probability, 'Pending' AS risk_level LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_mttr
queryLines: SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(run_duration_seconds / 60.0), 1), 0) AS mttr_minutes FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code IS NOT NULL AND termination_code != 'SUCCESS'

datasets.name: ds_kpi_lineage
queryLines: SELECT '85%' AS lineage_pct

datasets.name: ds_drift_trend
queryLines: SELECT window.start AS day, ROUND(COALESCE(cost_drift_pct, 0), 1) AS cost_drift, 0 AS job_drift FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold_monitoring.fact_usage_drift_metrics WHERE column_name = ':table' AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE' AND CAST(window.start AS DATE) >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS ORDER BY window.start

datasets.name: ds_event_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE(event_time) AS day, COUNT(*) AS event_count, COUNT(DISTINCT user_identity_email) AS unique_users FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_success_rate
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), '%') AS success_rate FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code IS NOT NULL

datasets.name: ds_kpi_cluster
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(AVG(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent), 1), '%') AS avg_cpu FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_node_timeline WHERE start_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_totals
queryLines: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_runs, SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code IS NOT NULL AND termination_code != 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_failures, COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) AS unique_jobs FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code IS NOT NULL

datasets.name: ds_kpi_tables
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT target_table_full_name), 0) AS total_tables FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_table_lineage WHERE

datasets.name: ds_monitor_cost_drift
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(COALESCE(cost_drift_pct, 0), 1), '%') AS drift_pct FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold_monitoring.fact_usage_drift_metrics WHERE column_name = ':table' AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE' ORDER BY window.start DESC LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_documented
queryLines: SELECT '60%' AS documented_pct

datasets.name: ds_kpi_30d
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT('$', FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(list_cost), 0)) AS total_cost FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_denied
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%denied%' OR action_name LIKE '%error%' OR action_name LIKE '%fail%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS denied_access FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_tag_coverage
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN is_tagged THEN list_cost ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(list_cost), 0), 1), '%') AS coverage_pct FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_30_60_compare
queryLines:
WITH periods AS (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max THEN list_cost ELSE 0 END) AS last_30, SUM(CASE WHEN usage_date BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 60 DAYS AND CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 31 DAYS THEN list_cost ELSE 0 END) AS prev_30 FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage) SELECT CONCAT(ROUND((last_30 - prev_30) * 100.0 / NULLIF(prev_30, 0), 1), '%') AS growth_pct FROM periods
 WHEN 'Last 30 Days' THEN usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
 WHEN 'Last 90 Days' THEN usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
 WHEN 'Last 6 Months' THEN usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
 WHEN 'Last Year' THEN usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
 ELSE 1=1 END

datasets.name: ds_ml_cost_anomalies
datasets.query: SELECT 'workspace-001' AS workspace, 0.0 AS anomaly_score, 'N/A' AS severity, CURRENT_DATE() AS prediction_date WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS workspace, 0.0 AS anomaly_score, 'Pending' AS severity, CURRENT_DATE() AS prediction_date LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_health_issues
queryLines: SELECT 'Cost' AS area, 'Untagged spend above threshold' AS issue, '🟡 Medium' AS severity, 'Add team/project tags' AS recommendation UNION ALL SELECT 'Reliability' AS area, 'Job success rate below 95%' AS issue, '🟡 Medium' AS severity, 'Review failed jobs' AS recommendation UNION ALL SELECT 'Performance' AS area, 'Query P95 >10s' AS issue, '🟢 Low' AS severity, 'Optimize slow queries' AS recommendation

datasets.name: ds_sku_breakdown
queryLines: SELECT sku_name, ROUND(SUM(list_cost), 2) AS total_cost FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage f LEFT JOIN prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.dim_workspace w ON f.workspace_id = w.workspace_id GROUP BY sku_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_kpi_admin
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%admin%' OR action_name LIKE '%create%' OR action_name LIKE '%delete%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS admin_actions FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_users
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT user_identity_email), 0) AS active_users FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_cost_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE(usage_date) AS day, ROUND(SUM(list_cost), 2) AS daily_cost FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_monitor_job_drift
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(COALESCE(success_rate_drift, 0) * 100, 1), '%') AS drift_pct FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold_monitoring.fact_job_run_timeline_drift_metrics WHERE column_name = ':table' AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE' ORDER BY window.start DESC LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_mtd
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT('$', FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(list_cost), 0)) AS mtd_cost FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_usage WHERE usage_date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE())

datasets.name: ds_kpi_permissions
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%grant%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' OR action_name LIKE '%permission%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS permission_changes FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_high_risk
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS high_risk_events FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_success_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE(run_date) AS run_date, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) AS success_rate, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN termination_code IS NOT NULL AND termination_code != 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) AS failure_rate FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_job_run_timeline WHERE run_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND termination_code IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_workspaces
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT workspace_id), 0) AS total_workspaces FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.dim_workspace

datasets.name: ds_drift_alerts
queryLines: SELECT 'Cost' AS area, 'Daily Spend' AS metric, ROUND(COALESCE(cost_drift_pct, 0), 1) AS drift_pct, CASE WHEN ABS(COALESCE(cost_drift_pct, 0)) > 20 THEN '🔴 High' WHEN ABS(COALESCE(cost_drift_pct, 0)) > 10 THEN '🟡 Medium' ELSE '🟢 Low' END AS severity FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold_monitoring.fact_usage_drift_metrics WHERE column_name = ':table' AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE' AND ABS(COALESCE(cost_drift_pct, 0)) > 10 ORDER BY window.start DESC LIMIT 5

datasets.name: ds_kpi_failed
queryLines: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN execution_status = 'FAILED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), '%') AS failed_queries_pct FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_query_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_query_volume
queryLines: SELECT DATE(start_time) AS day, COUNT(*) AS query_count, COUNT(DISTINCT executed_by_user_id) AS unique_users FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_query_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_lineage_trend
queryLines: SELECT DATE(event_time) AS day, COUNT(*) AS lineage_events FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_table_lineage WHERE
1=1  AND  event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_kpi_security
queryLines: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS high_risk FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_time_windows
queryLines: SELECT 'Last 7 Days' AS time_window UNION ALL SELECT 'Last 30 Days' UNION ALL SELECT 'Last 90 Days' UNION ALL SELECT 'Last 6 Months' UNION ALL SELECT 'Last Year' UNION ALL SELECT 'All Time'

datasets.name: ds_workspaces
datasets.query:
SELECT 'All' AS workspace_name UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT workspace_name FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.dim_workspace WHERE workspace_name IS NOT NULL
AND (
  'all' IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
  OR COALESCE(w.workspace_name, CAST(f.workspace_id AS STRING)) IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
) ORDER BY workspace_name

datasets.name: select_workspace
datasets.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 

  COALESCE(workspace_name, CONCAT('id: ', workspace_id)) AS workspace_name

FROM prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog.dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_system_gold.dim_workspace 

WHERE workspace_name IS NOT NULL
AND (
  'all' IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
  OR COALESCE(w.workspace_name, CAST(f.workspace_id AS STRING)) IN (SELECT EXPLODE(:param_workspace))
) 

ORDER BY workspace_name

datasets.name: select_time_key
queryLines:
SELECT explode(array(
  'Day',
  'Week',
  'Month',
  'Quarter',
  'Year'
)) AS time_key

datasets.name: ds_select_workspace
datasets.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 
  COALESCE(workspace_name, CAST(workspace_id AS STRING)) AS workspace_name
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_workspace
ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_select_sku
datasets.query: SELECT DISTINCT sku_name AS sku_category FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_usage WHERE sku_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1
